item.title: Welcome To The Big Bandwidth Era
item.description:
Remember the days of big band music? While many may not be familiar with that era, technology has dramatically changed since then. We’ve moved from radio and kilocycles to the digital age with bandwidth measured in Mbps and Gbps. This is the era of big bandwidth. But what exactly qualifies as “big bandwidth”? NuVox, a leading telecommunications company, defines it as any bandwidth exceeding 10 Mbps. This speed is the target for home internet providers as video streaming gains popularity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/welcome-to-the-big-bandwidth-era/
